body.description: Multi Purpose Use The Second Sofa Rather than gathering around the TV, more and more families are doing several activities at once in the living room – which often sees the rug functioning as an alternative to the sofaAs with a sofa, choose a style that complements your other furnishings. For instance, if your walls are a neutral shade, a bright rug can add an accent of colour and individuality A Rug for Every Room Your rug should be the first thing you sink your toes into after stepping out of bed. So, when choosing a new rug for your bedroom, you want it to feel soft and comfortable underfootFor children’s bedroom, a fluffy rug is the best option given its durability and the fact that it’s easy to clean. Go for a rug with plastic spots backing, this will ensure it doesn’t move around when your kids are playing

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Fluffy Ultra Soft Area Rugs for Bedroom Living Room Nursery Home Decor Rug Life, Choosing The Right Rug For Your Room A rug is the perfect way to add colour, texture and cosiness to a roomWhile it’s true that modern rugs are designed to add beauty and warmth to a room, they’re also used as a place to sit and relaxSo, if you’re in need of a new rug for your home, make sure you consider how you use your room before you start your search

Care Instructions Do not bleach Do not tumble dry Do not iron Flat drying Hand wash or machine wash on a delicate wash cycleShake it to fluff up when wet, brush up the pile once dry Multi Purpose Use The Second Sofa Rather than gathering around the TV, more and more families are doing several activities at once in the living room – which often sees the rug functioning as an alternative to the sofaAs with a sofa, choose a style that complements your other furnishings. For instance, if your walls are a neutral shade, a bright rug can add an accent of colour and individuality A Rug for Every Room Your rug should be the first thing you sink your toes into after stepping out of bed. So, when choosing a new rug for your bedroom, you want it to feel soft and comfortable underfootFor children’s bedroom, a fluffy rug is the best option given its durability and the fact that it’s easy to clean. Go for a rug with plastic spots backing, this will ensure it doesn’t move around when your kids are playing

Ultra Comfy and Plush The rug's thick, plush tufts across its entire top surface offer a beautiful appearance, interesting texture, and a rich, soft feel Premier Quality and Workmanship The fluffy rug is made of premium quality material and is very durable and soft High quality fabric and superb craftsmanship allow these shaggy rugs to accompany you for a very long time A New Gift Solution These area rugs will make a perfect gift for friends, mom and dad or loved ones for Thanksgiving Day, Christmas, etc. Besides regular use, it is a great option for your pets, dogs enjoy sleeping on these mats Easy To Clean Dirt can be easily removed from the rug, you just need to put the rug in a laundry bag and turn on the washing machine

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This rug is really pretty and very soft. It’s a nice size but is a little slick especially if you’re wearing socks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The colors are so vivid and bright, I couldn't compliment the colors enough. Gorgeous. This rug is so soft and wears well. It seems like it would be fragile but it wears well and I can vacuum it with my regular vacuum and it doesn't hurt it at all. I love these rugs. It does take a few days for them to lay flat once they do all the creases from packaging come out. I bought several of these rugs in different colors and sizes and they are softer, prettier, more durable, and more luxurious than I expected them to be by far. They're so beautiful and wear so well I can keep them and use them for many years. And I was always used to a more traditional rug these are so modern. I love them. I'm using them to cover up my wood floors I don't like wood floors so I also put a half inch carpet padding under them which gives them a richer look and my wood floors are not hard on my feet. They look great and it's easy to get colors that go together with these rugs. And I decided just to get these rugs in different colors and not have mitch match rugs so all the rugs are in sync cuz they're all this make and style. So even though I put different colors in different rooms they're all in sync with this style rug and the house looks great. And these are very different from traditional shag rugs, because they don't shed and they do not lose their softness. These rugs are so nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels fabulous under bare feet.
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this for my bathroom.LOVE it. Will probably get more.Good price and good quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Extremely soft and perfect color. Perfect if you’re looking for a cheaper option and a smaller rug.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this rug, super soft and looks good beside of bedl, would definitely order again, super satisfied

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute Loves the oval
reviews.reviewText: Granddaughter loved it. I’ve worked in floor coverings much of my life. So it’s difficult to watch my granddaughter love it - because the picture looked so good. So it was all about the color, gray and the oval. I on the other hand would never buy it again. It is thin and the pile is long but not thick. It will never stand up like the picture. It will lay flat, which is how it came. And it doesn’t even make it to the outside edge. So the backing and stitching around the edge are completely exposed. There’s no binding. Just visible stitching. I think as we head into winter the rug will not meet her imagined fluffy and warm expectations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super soft. Medium Quality
reviews.reviewText: This isn’t the highest quality but it’s cute, soft, and big. Also, the value is worth what you pay.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024

reviews.reviewText: el producto es totalmente diferente a como se ve en la fotografia, la descripcion no es corcorrecta, esta muy delgado el tapete, resbaloso y la calidad es terrible. no pagaria ni $100 pesos por el.
